tagline: Extracting semantic information from the Greek Parliament archives : an experimentation project
body:
# The Parliament Project

This webpage describes the Greek Parliament project, an attempt to provide indexed information about events regarding the greek parliament and its conferences. It accomplishes that by converting the parliament transcripts from raw text (.txt .doc or .pdf) to [Akoma Ntoso](http://www.akomantoso.org/). 
For visualization and hosting, [SayIt](http://greek-parliament.sayit.mysociety.org/) and [PopIt](https://greekparliament.popit.mysociety.org/) is be used. 
The project is still in development.
